text: Ise$, maççi ma tezzim udmawen nnwen, ar ugmuv akked utaram. Maca, ise$ d wid iumnen s Öebbi, s wass aneggaru, s lmalayek, s Tazmamt, s lambiyya. U ppaken ayla, $ef lemêibba S, i llzem, igujilen, igellilen, win d ibbwi ubrid, imapparen, akw i uberru n waklan. D wid ipéallan, ipzekkin, ippaîîafen di lemâahda nnsen, ma âahden, iûebôiyen di lmeêna akked twa$it, di tegwnip n ccqa. D wigi i illan di tidep, d wigi i ipêezziben
